name: Remote Senior Back End C# Developer (.NET Core) – Big Data
description:
Looking to work with the latest technologies in Big Data for an award-winning software company? Smart Apartment Data is an employee-rated five start employer. We are looking for an experienced back end C# developer (.net core) to help build our next generation of software products. As a winner of the ‘Houston Best & Brightest Companies to Work for ‘, we place strong emphasis on offering a fun work-environment, generous pay with bonuses, and a healthy work-life balance.

Requirements

  • Fluent in English
  • European time zone work hours.
  • 4+ years of experience as a C# developer


Responsibilities

  • Solid understanding of REST API design methodologies using .Net Core 5.x (C#)
  • Strong understanding of relational database design
  • Experience with AWS or Big Data is not necessary, but would help
  • Help create technical direction for the team

Benefits

  • Location Independent / 100% Remote with flexible work hours
  • Competitive base salary with guaranteed annual bonus.
  • Work with latest technologies
  • Fun and dynamic work culture
